DOC.brief_summary: Objective To evaluate effect local injury endometrium implantation , pregnancy live birth rate ICSI -ET cycle recurrent implantation failure . Design Randomized control clinical study . Setting A clinical assist reproductive center Selcuk University Meram Medical Faculty Hospital Konya , Turkey . Population A group 100 woman , fail conceive one cycle IVF embryo transfer ( ET ) , treat long protocol control ovarian hyperstimulation . Methods The IVF treatment ET precede repeat endometrial biopsy , randomly select 50 total 100 woman .
DOC.brief_title: Endometrial Injury Increases Implantation Pregnancy Rates
DOC.detailed_description: The clinical study take place clinical assist reproductive center Selcuk University Meram Medical Faculty Hospital Konya , Turkey . A group 100 woman apply clinic due infertility undergo one fail fresh IVF cycle previously include study ICSI-ET ( intracytoplasmic sperm injection-embryo transfer ) . We exclude woman factor hydrosalpinx , trombophilia , submucous myoma find negative impact implantation . Women give information study , write informed consent obtain . Our study also receive approval ethic committee faculty . Women study group ( n=50 ) randomly select . The random allocation base computer generate random number . All 100 woman treate long protocol COH ( control group=group 1 , n=50 study group=group 2 , n=50 . On hand , woman study group ( group 2 , n=50 ) undergo endometrial biopsy one-week interval luteal phase nontransfer cycle . Endometrial biopsy performe biopsy catheter ( Pipelle ; de Cornier , Prodimed , Neuilly-en-Thelle , France ) . The catheter pass cervical o rotate uterine cavity apply 3-4 time withdraw piston . After administration GnRH analog 2nd-3rd day next menstruation least 14 day woman without menstruation , patient criteria include serum estrogen ( E2 ) level 50 pg/ml , endometrial thickness < 5mm , lack observation active follicle transvaginal ultrasonography accept regulation , gonadotropin therapy [ recFSH ; Puregon ( Organon ) , Gonal F ( Serono ) , u-FSH/HMG ; Merional ( IBSA ) , Menogon ( Ferring ) ] start properly adjust dose patient . Estimated ovarian response consider case determine initial dose . While start SC/I.M . gonadotropin average dose 225 IU/day , GnRH analog ( Leuprolide acetate ; Lucrin , Abbott ) maintain hCG day reduce 0.5 mg/day doze uninterruptedly . When lead follicle become 18-20 mm two follicle become 17 mm , ovulation trigger administer 10.000 IU urinary hCG ( Pregnyl amp ; Organon , Turkey ) . Follicle aspiration oocyte collection procedure perform range 35th-37th hour follow hCG administration . Semen specimen collect day follicle aspiration perform several hour procedure masturbation method generally sexual fast 2-4 day . Sperms total 6 men , equally 3 men group , obtain TESA/TESE method . Microinjection procedure suitable adequate number oocyte perform follow oocyte collection procedure . Fertilization rate evaluate subsequent 18th hour embryo development evaluate 24th-48th-72nd hour . On 2nd-3rd 4th day follow oocyte collection , maximum 3 embryo high quality score ( grade 3 4 embryo consider good quality embryo ) select , transfer intrauterine cavity accompaniment ultrasonography . Wallace 23 mm soft catheter ( Smiths , England ) use transfer catheter . Follicle aspiration embryo transfer procedure perform physician study . Luteal phase support start even follicle aspiration woman . Use intravaginal micronized progesterone 3x200 mg ( Progeston soft capsule ; Kocak ilac , Turkey ) , intramuscular progesterone 25 mg/day ( Progeston oil ) , prednisol tablet 5 day 16 mg/ day p.o . dose ( Mustafa Nevzat , Turkey ) Estraderm TTS 100 ( Novartis Pharma , Basel , Switzerland ) 100 microgram/ alternate day recommend pregnancy result become apparent .
